home.title: Engineer & Full Stack & DevOps Developer
home.description: Specialized in microservices architectures and modern web application development. I combine technical expertise and creativity to design robust and scalable solutions, with a focus on automation and user experience.

bio.part1: I am Aymen Jallouli, a Full Stack & DevOps Engineer with a passion for building modern and scalable applications. With expertise in both front-end and back-end technologies, I create comprehensive solutions that marry form and function.
bio.part2: My technical journey spans various domains including microservices architecture, cloud infrastructure, and continuous integration/deployment pipelines. I'm particularly focused on creating solutions that are not only technologically sound but also provide exceptional user experiences.
bio.part3: Outside of coding, I enjoy staying up-to-date with the latest technological trends, contributing to open-source projects, and solving complex problems that challenge my skills and creativity.

education.title: Software Engineering Degree
education.description: Studied at ESPRIT School of Engineering with a focus on software architecture, DevOps practices, and distributed systems.

developer.title: Full Stack & DevOps Engineer
developer.description: Working on various projects implementing microservices architectures, CI/CD pipelines, and modern web applications.

projects.title: My Projects
projects.noResults: No projects match the selected category.

parkini.description: A modern solution for smart parking management with real-time detection using AI. Features include user management, spot reservation, payment integration, and admin analytics.

taskManager.title: Task Manager Microservices
taskManager.description: A scalable task management system built with Spring Boot microservices architecture. Features service discovery with Eureka, API gateway, and Kafka for asynchronous communication.

pureLife.description: A responsive website focused on promoting healthy living and wellness products, featuring an elegant UI with smooth animations and a modern design aesthetic.

devops.description: Implementation of a complete CI/CD pipeline with Jenkins, SonarQube, Docker, and automated testing. Features automated deployment and quality gate controls.

Ai-Dashboard.description: An intelligent dashboard with AI models built in Python for predicting parking duration, occupancy rate, and user clustering. Features a modern React front-end with Material UI components for data visualization and analytics.

contact.title: Contact Me
contact.subtitle: Get In Touch
contact.intro: I'm always open to discussing new projects, opportunities, or collaborations. Feel free to reach out using the form below or via my email or social media.

footer.tagline: Building innovative digital solutions with modern technologies
